title: Find the Period
text: For the standard secant function $$f(x)=Asec(Bx-C)$$, the period is $$\frac{2\pi}{|B|}$$. So $$T=\frac{2\pi}{3}=\frac{2}{3} \pi$$.

title: Find the Horizontal Shift
text: For the standard secant function $$f(x)=Asec(Bx-C)$$, the phase shift is $$\frac{C}{B}$$. So $$h=0$$.
